dialogue.text: gf:This trip is a nice change of pace from our usual dates.
bf:Yeah, my family and I used to hang out here a ton.
gf:It's really nice and it smells good here, though I'm surprised you can drive a car.
flaky:Where did you last see it, Flippy?
flippy:Well, it was somewhere around these trees and bushes, but it's probably best if we split up so we can find it faster.
flippy:Well, it was somewhere around these trees and bushes, but it's probably best if we split up so we can find it faster.
I'll give you a signal if I happen to find it.
flaky:Alrighty, I'll go tell the others then!
bf:Ah shit, this mic won't work.
gf:Maybe it's worn from all the adventures you've had. Perhaps it's time to get a new one?
bf:Nah, don't worry, I can fix it. Probably.
